UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Component_Emissive_Gauge
UseTemplate.EMISSIVE_CODE: (A:HYDRAULIC PRESSURE:#ID#, psi) #PRESS_WARNING_THRESHOLD_PSI# (A:HYDRAULIC RESERVOIR PERCENT:#ID#, percent over 100) * <

Parameters.ON_BEFORE_SET: #ON_BEFORE_SET# (E:IS IN VR, Boolean) (E:IS USING MOTION CONTROLLERS, Boolean) (E:IS USING JOYSTICK THROTTLE, Boolean) ! (L:XMLVAR_IE_Throttle_Reverser_VR_Handled) ! and and and if{ 1 (>L:XMLVAR_IE_Throttle_Reverser_VR_Handled) p0 #LOWER_LIMIT# / (>L:XMLVAR_IE_Throttle_Reverser_VR_Value) (>B:Set_All_Throttle_Reverser) 0 (>L:XMLVAR_IE_Throttle_Reverser_VR_Handled) quit }

Set.Code: #ON_BEFORE_SET# p0 #LOWER_LIMIT# max #UPPER_LIMIT# min sp0 #CAN_SET_THROTTLE# if{ l0 (>K:THROTTLE#REVERSER_ID#_SET) } els{ #UPPER_LIMIT# (>O:ENGINE_Throttle_Reverser_#REVERSER_ID#_Position) }

False.IS_SWITCH_ON: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or

Parameters.FORMAT_VS_VALUE: (L:XMLVAR_FPA_MODE_ACTIVE) if{ l0 '%.1f FPA' (F:Format) } els{ l0 '%d ft/min' (F:Format) }

(A:GENERAL ENG MASTER ALTERNATOR:2, bool) ! and (L:B777_ADIRU_BUTTON_STATE, number) and and (A:APU GENERATOR SWITCH, bool) (A:APU RPM PERCENT, percent) 95 > and !
